summary: The Spectral Arrows that go with my Spectral Bow
descriptionHtml:
I made these \"Bound Arrows\" from the game craftable at the FORGE.

FEATURES:
-Slightly lower gravity.
-Maximised range.
-Increased Damage.

REQUIREMENTS:
-Ectoplasm to create.
-Archane Smithing PERK (lvl 60+)

If you like this MOD please ENDORSE it and feel free to check out my other mods :-)
Follow me on FACEBOOK at Six6StarStudios

My Other MODs:
Whiterun Archery Shop - skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37130
Better Breezehome Basement - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36235
Denise Spectral Bow - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34528

Pay Bounty BAT Files - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35099
author: Six6Star
